ing: 1 pound firm tofu, sliced into 1/4 inch slices
des: "I have always made this recipe with chicken breasts until my daughter became a vegetarian and asked me to adapt the recipe for tofu."
ins: Melt butter in a medium skillet over medium-high heat.  Dredge tofu slices in flour and place in hot butter.  Brown slightly, then turn over and brown the other side.  Add water, wine and bouillon cubes; simmer for 10 minutes, or until bouillon completely dissolves.  Stir in mustard and honey.  Simmer until thickened.
